Cross-platform job scheduling software

Easily automate across systems and applications with ActiveBatch by Redwood’s low-code/no-code automation tools.

Get a Demo

Job scheduling has never been easier

The age of limited job scheduling tools is over. Use one centralized solution to handle everything from simple scheduled jobs to automating, deploying and orchestrating complex workflows that span your entire enterprise IT environment.

Unique batch processing power

Modern workload automation features, including load balancing and REST API adapters, help your organization accommodate larger volumes of jobs and data.

Pre-built job steps library

With job steps and templates, anyone on your IT team can quickly and easily spin up automation — no development expertise or custom scripting required.

Drag-and-drop workflow designer

An intuitive user interface makes it easy to build workflows with trigger actions based on email, file events, data modifications and more and reduce manual IT operations work.

Functional self-service portal

Easily accessible jobs and plans take the strain off IT departments, eliminate bottlenecks and give business users timely data without delay.

Real-time SLA monitoring and alerts

Go beyond just sending notification of an issue — dynamically provision resources and keep SLAs on track without team member intervention.

No scripting or coding required

It’s possible to offer advanced automation capabilities to non-technical users without foregoing your central point of job scheduling control.

Achieve consistent job execution

Job scheduling is the first step a business can take toward significantly improving operational efficiency and maximizing the effectiveness of its IT team. By automating and streamlining individual tasks, you improve resource allocation, eliminate manual work and complete critical jobs on time. This efficiency paves the way for maximizing your IT capabilities, increasing productivity and saving on costs.

  • Free up your talented staff to focus on higher-value activities.
  • Optimize task sequencing and resource allocation.
  • Meet deadlines consistently.
  • Enable proactive issue identification.
 Amplify Your Business Results

Go beyond basic job scheduling tools

ActiveBatch takes job scheduling to the next level, enabling workflow automation across all your applications and environments — on-premises, cloud or hybrid. Find unprecedented confidence in your batch jobs knowing you can:

  • Execute workflows across Windows, Linux and more.
  • Run any script and store script contents in the ActiveBatch back-end database.
  • Create a workspace for your jobs and other ActiveBatch objects and specify the order in which they run.
  • Create shareable objects to minimize maintenance.
  • Pass data between related jobs and plans and soft-code object properties in the event they change.
 Discover the Job Scheduler You Need

Leave limited job scheduling behind — Get more from your IT investments with:

  • Comprehensive monitoring and reporting: Get real-time visibility into workflows and detailed analytics for better decision-making.
  • Cost savings: Lowers operational costs by optimizing resource utilization and streamlining processes.
  • Improved reliability: Consistently execute tasks with built-in error handling and recovery mechanisms.
  • Increased efficiency: Automate repetitive and time-consuming tasks to reduce manual intervention and human error.
  • Scalability: Manage growing workloads and complex workflows across diverse systems without compromising performance.
 See the Power of Workload Automation

Connect your business-critical systems

Automate routine tasks, develop innovative processes and drive business growth with infinite options for extensibility, including:

  • An integrated Job Steps Library with endless drag-and-drop integrations.
  • Pre-built integrations for systems apps you already use: SAP NetWeaver, ERPs, HR platforms, BI tools and more.
  • Support for secure managed file transfers via SFTP, FTPS and web tunneling.
  • Seamless integrations with major cloud vendors like Amazon, Microsoft and VMware.
  • Two-way integrations for ServiceNow and Microsoft System Center Service Manager.

Job scheduler FAQs

What is an enterprise job scheduler?

An enterprise job scheduler is a software application that automates and manages the execution of IT tasks and workflows across an organization, ensuring they run efficiently and on time. It helps streamline operations by handling dependencies between tasks, monitoring job statuses and providing notifications for any issues that arise. An enterprise job scheduler empowers IT teams by consolidating automation tasks throughout the whole IT environment in a single interface.

Discover how enterprise job schedulers help your team upgrade from manual workflows.
What is another name for a job scheduler?

An enterprise job scheduler is often referred to as a workload automation solution. Workload automation software is a tool that helps schedule, manage and execute business processes and tasks without human intervention. It allows organizations to automate repetitive tasks, improve efficiency and ensure timely completion of workflows across various systems and platforms.

Learn more about workload automation and top trends.
What is the best job scheduler?

The best enterprise job scheduler software is designed to streamline and automate complex workflows across diverse systems, ensuring efficiency, scalability and reliability. It should offer robust support for cross-platform scheduling, enabling seamless integration with various operating systems, applications and databases.

Advanced features such as event-driven triggers, dependency management and predictive analytics are essential to optimize scheduling and prevent bottlenecks. Security and compliance are critical, with capabilities like role-based access control, encrypted data transfer and audit trails to meet regulatory standards. A modern job scheduler should also provide a user-friendly interface, with features such as a drag-and-drop workflow builder and support for self-service portals to empower non-technical end-users.

It should be extensible, offering APIs, universal connectors and out-of-the-box integrations for enterprise tools like ERP systems, cloud platforms and managed file transfer solutions. Scalability, high availability and real-time monitoring further distinguish top-tier job scheduling solutions, ensuring they meet the dynamic needs of modern enterprises.

Learn more about the capabilities of the best enterprise job schedulers.
